subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brees missed the Saints’ loss in Carolina last Sunday because of a bruised rotator cuff in his right shoulder. If he does start as planned, he will return to a team that is in desperate need of a victory.
snippet: Brees missed the Saints’ loss in Carolina last Sunday because of a bruised rotator cuff in his right shoulder. If he does start as planned, he will return to a team that is in desperate need of a victory.
